name: Oceanarium Tycoon - Aqua Zoo
description:
Let all your dreams come true with our new Oceanarium Tycoon - Aqua Zoo game! Explore the large thriving island, collect vital resources, catch some interesting underwater animals and build your own paradise-like aqua zoo! Whales, dolphins, sharks, medusas and just little exotic fish – prepare the living place for your ultimate collection!

Oceanarium Tycoon - Aqua Zoo features:
• Large paradise island to explore
• Interesting places to build the aquariums
• Decorating tools and materials
• A wide range of underwater creatures
• The chance to watch them breeding
• Opportunity to construct as you wish
• Colorful cubic 3D atmosphere

Become a real construction manager for your own aqua animals’ zoo playing Oceanarium Tycoon - Aqua Zoo game and be ready to invite some visitors!
